mapper.insert: insert into b_precision( year, month, head_dept, quota_name, quota_value, not_end_quota_name, not_end_quota_value, end_quota_name, end_quota_value ) values ( #{year}, #{month}, #{headDept}, #{quotaName}, #{quotaValue}, #{notEndQuotaName}, #{notEndQuotaValue}, #{endQuotaName}, #{endQuotaValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT pre.year, pre.month, pre.quota_name, pre.not_end_quota_name, pre.not_end_quota_value FROM b_precision AS pre GROUP BY pre.not_end_quota_name HAVING pre.`year` = #{year} AND pre.`month` = #{month} AND pre.quota_name = #{quotaName} AND pre.not_end_quota_name != '扣分项' AND pre.not_end_quota_name != '加减分项' AND pre.not_end_quota_name != '减分项'
